name: Get Z! - Addictive Letter Puzzle Mania
name_original: Get Z! - Addictive Letter Puzzle Mania
description:
Get the final letter Z – An awesome letter puzzle game is coming to you! Connect the neighboring same letters and merge them to a new one!

How to play:
Connect 3 or more than 3 same nearest letters, and merge them to another one.
Connect As, you get B.
Connect Bs, you get C.
Connect Cs, you get D.
…
The ultimate goal of the game is to get Z.

It seems difficult! But thanks to 3 smart buttons, they will help you go further.
*Switch Button: Click any of the 2 letters to switch their positions.
*Clear Button: Click a letter and make all the same letters disappear.
*Reshuffle button: Click the button to rearrange all the letters.

Challenge yourself and see which letter you can get!
